Title: John the Baptist prepares people so that they would believe in Jesus. The gospel that is about Jesus Christ, who is God's Son, begins here.

John the Baptist came to the wilderness. He told those people that they should be baptized. Whenever a person is baptized, people know that he repented. Then God will forgive that person's sins.<<The messenger that Isaiah talked about was John the Baptist.>> John the Baptist came to the wilderness. <<And many people came to see John.>> John told those people that they should be baptized in water. Whenever a person is baptized in water, people know that he repented. End of Alternates. <<The Scribes want all people to think that they are important.>> While the Scribes walk <<in front of people>>, they like wearing expensive and beautiful clothes.
